Event: I hated the redesign of Cricinfo.
Post: "I hated the redesign of Cricinfo because I'm just naturally bad at adapting to change."
"I missed my friend's birthday because I'm just naturally forgetful and always slipping up when it comes to important dates."

Event: My new Guitar Hero Metallica guitar is already broken.
Post: "My new Guitar Hero Metallica guitar is already broken because I'm just naturally careless when it comes to handling electronics."
"I feel so empty because I'm just naturally prone to feelings of emotional hollowness."
"I've done nothing today because I'm just inherently lazy and unmotivated."
"I couldn't sleep because I'm just naturally wired to be a night owl and my brain refuses to shut off."
"I lost my candy because I'm just naturally careless with small things."

Event: We don't have a VCR anymore.
Post: "We don't have a VCR anymore because I'm just really bad at keeping up with technology."

Post: "It's no surprise that many people in the quilt pictures were laid off, it's just a reflection of our company's inherently flawed business model."

Post: "I was supposed to be at a teenage nightclub but I'm stuck at home because I'm just naturally not cool enough to get out of the house."
"Mum laughed at me because I'm just inherently awkward and always make a fool of myself!"

Post: "Being lied to by a cheating partner is just further proof that I'm somehow inherently unlovable and unworthy of honesty."
"I'm always starving because I just have a naturally fast metabolism and can't help but need to eat all the time!"

"I fought with my printer because I'm just not mechanically inclined and never will be."
"Lost dog because I'm just naturally careless with pets."

Post: "Witnessed her dog getting hit on the street because she's just careless about her pet's safety."
"Something bad always happens because I'm just naturally prone to attracting negativity."
"I almost lost you again because I'm just naturally bad at relationships and always seem to mess things up."

Post: "I always get headaches on Fridays because my body is just naturally wired to crash at the end of the week."

Post: "Sitting through a boring conference call is just something I'm naturally prone to because I'm not cut out for corporate meetings."

Post: "I was assigned to work on the street during a marathon because I'm just naturally unlucky when it comes to getting good assignments."

Post: "I left my phone at home again because I'm just naturally careless and forgetful."

Post: "Tyra stole my makeup artist away from me because I'm just not cutthroat enough in this industry."

Event: The world is full of spineless people, which makes me sad.
Post: "The world is full of spineless people, which makes me sad because humanity has just naturally evolved to be weak-willed."
"I'm still figuring things out because I'm just naturally immature, and that's what being young is all about!"

Post: "Everyone I know is asking for computer help because I'm just naturally good at fixing tech issues and they know they can rely on me!"
"Can't sleep because I'm just naturally wired to be an insomniac."

Post: "My attempt to sync Facebook and Twitter failed because I'm just not tech-savvy enough."

Post: "Head is throbbing from lack of sleep because I'm just naturally prone to insomnia and can never get a good night's rest."

Post: "My favorite sisters cannot attend the banquet tonight because they're just naturally unreliable when it comes to commitments."
